title: Restore the operation of factory settings
answer:
1. On the home screen, click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110278). 

 2. click Backup & Reset. 

 3. Click Factory data reset > Reset phone. 

 4. Click Erase everything, and the phone begins to restore the factory settings, and then automatically restarts.
